metadata.title: CVE-2024-7110 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab EE affecting all versions starting 17.0to 17.1.6, 17.2 prior to 17.2.4, and 17.3 prior to 17.3.1 allows anattacker to execute arbitrary command in a victim's pipeline through promptinjection.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
